thread.title: City Names John Buturla as Interim DCAO for Operations (City of Richmond, VA)
thread.title_full: City Names John Buturla as Interim DCAO for Operations (City of Richmond, VA) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: City Names John Buturla as Interim DCAO for Operations (City of Richmond, VA)
text: ( Source : City of Richmond , VA) The Administration of Mayor Dwight C. Jones today announced that Deputy Chief John J. Buturla will serve as the Interim Deputy Chief Administrative Officer (DCAO) for Operations, effective October, 14 , 2015 .
